body:
Vulnerable Library - modernc.org/sqlite-v1.20.0

Found in HEAD commit: 21ed2aa5a1088bb0228d0d18883617ebb2f41ba2

## Vulnerabilities | CVE | Severity | CVSS | Dependency | Type | Fixed in (modernc.org/sqlite-v1.20.0 version) | Remediation Available | | ------------- | ------------- | ----- | ----- | ----- | ------------- | --- | | [CVE-2020-28928](https://www.mend.io/vulnerability-database/CVE-2020-28928) | Medium | 5.5 | modernc.org/libc-v1.21.5 | Transitive | N/A* | ❌ |

*For some transitive vulnerabilities, there is no version of direct dependency with a fix. Check the section "Details" below to see if there is a version of transitive dependency where vulnerability is fixed.

## Details
CVE-2020-28928 ### Vulnerable Library - modernc.org/libc-v1.21.5

Library home page: https://proxy.golang.org/modernc.org/libc/@v/v1.21.5.zip

Dependency Hierarchy: - modernc.org/sqlite-v1.20.0 (Root Library) - :x: **modernc.org/libc-v1.21.5** (Vulnerable Library)

Found in HEAD commit: 21ed2aa5a1088bb0228d0d18883617ebb2f41ba2

Found in base branch: master

### Vulnerability Details

In musl libc through 1.2.1, wcsnrtombs mishandles particular combinations of destination buffer size and source character limit, as demonstrated by an invalid write access (buffer overflow).

Publish Date: 2020-11-24

URL: CVE-2020-28928

### CVSS 3 Score Details (5.5)

Base Score Metrics: - Exploitability Metrics: - Attack Vector: Local - Attack Complexity: Low - Privileges Required: Low - User Interaction: None - Scope: Unchanged - Impact Metrics: - Confidentiality Impact: None - Integrity Impact: None - Availability Impact: High

For more information on CVSS3 Scores, click here.

### Suggested Fix

Type: Upgrade version

Origin: https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2020-28928

Release Date: 2020-11-24

Fix Resolution: musl - 1.2.2-1,1.2.2-1,1.1.16-3+deb9u1
